subtitle: These delicate and delicious salmon pastries are ideal for entertaining either as a starter or as part of a buffet.

method.text: Brush each filo pastry sheet with melted butter. Cut into 6 x 8 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm x 11cm rectangles. Arrange 3 filo pastry rectangles in muffin tins, overlapping each other to line the tin.
Bake in oven for 4-5 min or until golden brown. Remove from oven and leave to cool on a wire tray.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, mix together the cucumber, salmon, dill, fromage frais and pepper.
Divide the filling between the filo cups and serve.

title: Salmon and dill filo cups
